no surprise in the Simon Cowell that Rushfield presents, but he does bring him to life-- by turns brilliant and exasperating, self-serving and disarmingly honest. Rushfield sums him up well: If ever a person could be prepared for fame and all that came with it, it was Simon Cowell ... For 20 years, Simon Cowell had been involved in every aspect of the shadowy business of creating stars...
